document_data.name: Nass
document_data.mainbody:
Sharp-eye '''Nass''' was a [[goblin]] scout and a member of the camp that followed the faithful of [[the Absolute]] and dwelled within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Seen this mess? [[Flaming Fist|Flamin' Fist]] thuggo took a chunk outta me arm last raid out.|Nass.}}
document_data.Activities: As one of her goblin camp's sharp-eyes, Nass acted as a scout working under [[Skrut]].
document_data.History: Nass was among the raiders that burned down [[Waukeen's Rest]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. While Nass endured an injured arm, she managed to make it back to the Shattered Sanctum alive.
